code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const EditGameDialog=_ref=>{let{open,titleInit,dateInit,onSave,onCancel}=_ref;const[title,setTitle]=useState('');const[date,setDate]=useState('');useEffect(()=>{if(open){setTitle(titleInit||'');setDate(dateInit||'');}},[open,titleInit,dateInit]);if(!open)return null;const handleSave=()=>{if(!title.trim())return;onSave({title,date});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"confirm-overlay",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"confirm-dialog",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{style:{marginTop:0,marginBottom:'1rem'},children:"Edit Game"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{display:'flex',flexDirection:'column',gap:'0.75rem',marginBottom:'1.2rem'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{value:title,onChange:e=>setTitle(e.target.value),placeholder:"Game name"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"date",value:date,onChange:e=>setDate(e.target.value)})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{display:'flex',justifyContent:'center',gap:'1rem'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"outline-btn",onClick:onCancel,children:"Cancel"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleSave,children:"Save"})]})]})});};export default EditGameDialog;
